verses.verse: Now Moses<WH4872> was keeping<WH1961> the flock<WH6629> of Jethro<WH3503> his father-in<WH2859>-law, the priest<WH3548> of Midian<WH4080>: and he led<WH5090> the flock<WH6629> to the back<WH310> of the wilderness<WH4057>, and came<WH935> to the mountain<WH2022> of God<WH430>, unto Horeb<WH2722>.

And the angel<WH4397> of Jehovah<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> unto him in a flame<WH3827> of fire<WH784> out of the midst<WH8432> of a bush<WH5572>: and he looked<WH7200>, and<WH5572>, behold, the bush burned<WH1197> with fire<WH784>, and the bush<WH5572> was not consumed<WH398>.
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559>, I will turn aside<WH5493> now<WH7200>, and see this great<WH1419> sight<WH4758>, why<WH4069> the bush<WH5572> is not burnt<WH1197>.

And when Jehovah<WH3068> saw<WH7200> that he turned aside<WH5493> to see<WH7200>, God<WH430> called<WH7121> unto him out of the midst<WH8432> of the bush<WH5572>, and said<WH559>, Moses<WH4872>, Moses<WH4872>. And he said<WH559>, Here am I.

And he said<WH559>, Draw not nigh<WH7126> hither<WH1988>: put off<WH5394> thy shoes<WH5275> from off thy feet<WH7272>, for the place<WH4725> whereon<WH834> thou standest<WH5975> is holy<WH6944> ground<WH127>.

Moreover he said<WH559>, I am the God<WH430> of thy father<WH1>, the God<WH430> of Abraham<WH85>, the God<WH430> of Isaac<WH3327>, and the God<WH430> of Jacob<WH3290>. And Moses<WH4872> hid<WH5641> his face<WH6440>; for he was afraid<WH3372> to look<WH5027> upon God<WH430>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559>, I have surely<WH7200> seen<WH7200> the affliction<WH6040> of my people<WH5971> that are in Egypt<WH4714>, and have heard<WH8085> their cry<WH6818> by reason<WH6440> of their taskmasters<WH5065>; for I know<WH3045> their sorrows<WH4341>;

and I am come down<WH3381> to deliver<WH5337> them out of the hand<WH3027> of the Egyptians<WH4714>, and to bring<WH5927> them up out of that land<WH776> unto a good<WH2896> land<WH776> and a large<WH7342>, unto a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>; unto the place<WH4725> of the Canaanite<WH3669>, and the Hittite<WH2850>, and the Amorite<WH567>, and the Perizzite<WH6522>, and the Hivite<WH2340>, and the Jebusite<WH2983>.

And now<WH6818>, behold, the cry of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> is come<WH935> unto me<WH7200>: moreover I have seen the oppression<WH3906> wherewith the Egyptians<WH4714> oppress them<WH3905>.
Come <WH3212> now therefore<WH7971>, and I will send thee unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, that thou mayest bring forth<WH3318> my people<WH5971> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of Egypt<WH4714>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto God<WH430>, Who am I<WH3212>, that I should go unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, and that I should bring forth<WH3318> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of Egypt<WH4714>?

And he said<WH559>, Certainly I will be with thee<WH226>; and this shall be the token unto thee<WH3588>, that I have sent<WH7971> thee<WH3318>: when thou hast brought forth the people<WH5971> out of Egypt<WH4714>, ye shall serve<WH5647> God<WH430> upon this mountain<WH2022>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto God<WH430>, Behold<WH935>, when I come unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and shall say<WH559> unto them<WH430>, The God of your fathers<WH1> hath sent<WH7971> me unto you<WH559>; and they shall say to me<WH8034>, What is his name? What shall I say unto them<WH559>?

And God<WH430> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, I AM<WH1961> THAT I AM<WH1961>: and he said<WH559>, Thus shalt thou say<WH559> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, I AM hath sent me unto you<WH7971>.

And God<WH430> said<WH559> moreover<WH5750> unto Moses<WH4872>, Thus shalt thou say<WH559> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of your fathers<WH1>, the God<WH430> of Abraham<WH85>, the God<WH430> of Isaac<WH3327>, and the God<WH430> of Jacob<WH3290>, hath sent<WH7971> me unto you<WH8034>: this is my name for ever<WH5769>, and this is my memorial<WH2143> unto all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.

Go <WH3212>, and gather<WH622> the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> together<WH622>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH3068>, Jehovah, the God<WH430> of your fathers<WH1>, the God<WH430> of Abraham<WH85>, of Isaac<WH3327>, and of Jacob<WH3290>, hath appeared<WH7200> unto me<WH559>, saying, I have surely<WH6485> visited<WH6485> you<WH6213>, and seen that which is done to you in Egypt<WH4714>:

and I have said<WH559>, I will bring<WH5927> you up out of the affliction<WH6040> of Egypt<WH4714> unto the land<WH776> of the Canaanite<WH3669>, and the Hittite<WH2850>, and the Amorite<WH567>, and the Perizzite<WH6522>, and the Hivite<WH2340>, and the Jebusite<WH2983>, unto a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>.

And they shall hearken<WH8085> to thy voice<WH6963>: and thou shalt come<WH935>, thou and the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478>, unto the king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>, and ye shall say<WH559> unto him<WH3068>, Jehovah, the God<WH430> of the Hebrews<WH5680>, hath met<WH7136> with us<WH3212>: and now let us go, we pray thee<WH7969>, three days<WH3117>' journey<WH1870> into the wilderness<WH4057>, that we may sacrifice<WH2076> to Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>.
And I know<WH3045> that the king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> will not give you leave<WH5414> to go<WH1980>, no<WH2389>, not by a mighty hand<WH3027>.

And I will put forth<WH7971> my hand<WH3027>, and smite<WH5221> Egypt<WH4714> with all my wonders<WH6381> which I will do<WH6213> in the midst<WH7130> thereof<WH310>: and after that he will let you go<WH7971>.
And I will give<WH5414> this people<WH5971> favor<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of the Egyptians<WH4714>: and it shall come to pass<WH3212>, that, when ye go, ye shall not go<WH3212> empty<WH7387>:

but every woman<WH802> shall ask<WH7592> of her neighbor<WH7934>, and of her that sojourneth<WH1481> in her house<WH1004>, jewels<WH3627> of silver<WH3701>, and jewels<WH3627> of gold<WH2091>, and raiment<WH8071>: and ye shall put<WH7760> them upon your sons<WH1121>, and upon your daughters<WH1323>; and ye shall despoil<WH5337> the Egyptians<WH4714>.
